content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom looking out the window when suddenly a large oval light started hovering into sight it had a haze and made no noise it stayed hovering west then shot off like lighting out of sight.
content.summary: Large oval carft hovered for about 1 min then shot off like lightning

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking by my window when i noticed the orange ball. i knew it wasn't the moon because the moon was almost directly over my house. i went outside and noticed it was moving from 280 degrees from my position toward 100 degrees from my position or from wnw to ese, approximately. there were four of them equally spaced and seemed to rise out of the western horizon and travelling almost over my head at, perhaps 3,000 feet and spaced at perhaps a mile apart. they made no noise and they had no blinking lights like an airplane or helicopter would have. the balls were completely bright orange in color. the travelled in a straight line with no deviation whatsoever. i am somewhat hard of hearing, so they may have made some sound, however, they had no running lights which makes me think they were not private or commercial aircraft. i estimate they were traveling about 100 miles per hour or more, but without any references i have no way of knowing for sure. i plan to watch for a repeat performance during the next few nights at about the same time.

my only feeling was that they were very, very unusual and unlike anything i had ever seen. having been a student pilot and having done a lot of flying i easily classify then as ufos.

i did try to see them more clearly, using binoculars but they simply made the orange balls seem to glow brighter.

my wife was asleep so i have no other witnesses. i am a sky-watcher and often track the space station and orbiting spacecraft which appear as stars to me and move much more rapidly.
content.summary: 4 orange balls equally spaced traveling west to east no noise

content.detailedDescription: Hehqafcoshjv;lsajoi  jpoij ofjoijjvlksvhjpoaieg o o vlisjlksnjvoiegtilja;;kjg
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dsfsdf fdgfgd gads g sa

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to walk the first of my two dogs.  due to a recent broken wrist i had to now take them one at a time.  i left my house around 10 pm cdt and returned about 8 minutes after i left the house.  when i approached my house, which is on the southeast corner of an intersection.  i saw soft, glowing orb that came out of the southeast above the town below a strata of high clouds and but above a lower layer of clouds.  i was awestruck and realized i paused in the middle of the road at the intersection.  no one else was on the street to my knowledge and there was no traffic.  as i watched it come it hesitated for an instant as if it knew i was there, but then kept on its way.  as the first orb left, another one came shortly thereafter but kept on going without hesitation as did two more traveling slower than an airplane would and much lower in the sky. i also saw much higher up in the sky a blinking light from a passing jet.  i went into my house and left the first dog and picked up the next.  it may have taken me 2 minutes at the most. 

when i came out the door, 4 more additional orbs took the exact same path as the first group and when looked to the northwest i could see them in succession on the horizon. they then all disappeared one behind the other behind a bank of low clouds.  the orbs were silent. 

what an amazing experience!
content.summary: Observed 8 orbs following 1/4 mile between each other slower than an airplane would fly. from se to nw disappearing behind low clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach watching fireworks. it came form the ocean side hovered over us for about 45 seconds emitting bright led blue and red lights then shot off in a straight bee line south over the shore line. went so fast i blinked and lost it down the beach
content.summary: Hovering no sound bright led blue and red lights

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard walking my baby to sleep. i noticed the object glimmer above my neighbor's roof. when i first saw it, i thought it might be a giant bubble from a kid or something, but then it didn't pop. it was transparent but reflected light or glimmered as well. it came just over my head and hovered for what seemed like a long instant and i felt like it knew i saw it. i wasn't afraid, just very curious and mesmerized. i really was trying to think of a rational explanation for what it could be. then, it took off and i couldn't see it because my house was in the way. i ran over to our deck area to see if i could see it from there, and i again caught a glimpse of it, now far away and higher, still glimmering. from there, it gradually faded into the distance. i'm wondering if anyone else saw something like this in the area.
content.summary: Bubble orb object in seaside, ca

content.detailedDescription:
I am an avid stargazer. we just had a storm pass through. i saw 2 bright
lights moving parallel with each other. one of the lights stopped, and
got bigger and brighter.  the second light followed the first and it got
bigger and brighter too. both light returned to normal size and then flew
out of sight.  the lights were very high in the atmosphere.
i got a little scared when i saw something i couldn't explain.
content.summary: 2 bright lights moving around in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On july 7th, 2014, at chester cemetery in chester ca, elevation here is over 5,000 feet above sea level, i took two pictures of the sunbeams shinning down through the tree above me. these two pictures were literally taken seconds apart. the first one i clicked, and then i turned my phone sideways to capture a second angle and a second picture of the tree branches. during this entire time i did not actually see or hear anything in the sky, and not one of the other 14 people present did not witness anything either. it wasn't until i reviewed my pictures later that i saw the unusual ufo and pinkish light in my second photo! please review these photos for an explanation of this phenomenon. these pictures were taken by a samsung
 camera phone and were not altered or photoshopped in any way. thank you for your time and any information you may have to offer to explain what i captured in my picture.
content.summary: I was at a funeral taking a picture of the sun peaking through the tree branches. did not see ufo until a half hour later when i reviewed my pics. nobody present heard or witnessed anything in the sky  before or after this picture was taken.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 7th, 2014, at chester cemetery in chester ca, elevation here is over 5,000 feet above sea level, i took two pictures of the sunbeams shinning down through the tree above me. these two pictures were literally taken seconds apart. the first one i clicked, and then i turned my phone sideways to capture a second angle and a second picture of the tree branches. during this entire time i did not actually see or hear anything in the sky, and not one of the other 14 people present did not witness anything either. it wasn't until i reviewed my pictures later that i saw the unusual ufo and pinkish light in my second photo! please review these photos for an explanation of this phenomenon. these pictures were taken by a samsung
 camera phone and were not altered or photoshopped in any way. thank you for your time and any information you may have to offer to explain what i captured in my picture.
content.summary: I was at a funeral taking a picture of the sun peaking through the tree branches. did not see ufo until a half hour later when i reviewed my pics. nobody present heard or witnessed anything in the sky  before or after this picture was taken.

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home with my room mate in 2005 at 1:am cst. we noticed this "energy apparition" on top of a 2 story house about 150 to 200 feet away... we were the only car on the road for miles... this "energy apparition" seen the car approaching... about at that moment (5 seconds into the sighting) this "thing" stood up and leaped across a 2 lane road about 40 feet to a corn field directly parallel to the location of the house... landed about 1 foot off the ground and shot off into the field over 300 yards in 2-3 seconds... during the duration of this my room mate and i were dumbfounded and couldn't speak. when it was over i asked my friend did you see that, he said yep.... he still will not talk about this with any one... when i ask what it was he said he just wants to forget...

it wasn't a disk, it had no exact shape.. this object was shifting shape and moved almost like it was a living entity...

im a united states navy vet-
im not even close to crazy
im not on drugs
i know it wasn't swamp gas either....
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like raw energy with intellegence.. disturbing

content.detailedDescription: We were in the car at about 4pm leaving the trader joes parking lot in santa rosa when i looked up and saw this object just sitting in the sky right below the cloud line. i started yelling at my partner look look omg omg look what is that? he couldn't see it for a minute, once he spotted it the object started moving across the sky with a strange energy globe that was pushing the clouds away from around it as it was spinning and changing shape almost.  my partner at first tried to reason it into an airplane or helicopter but as it moved across the sky even he clearly could tell that from no angle did it have wings or a propeller.  we both noticed the "aura" surrounding it and how it seemed to separate the clouds as it moved through them.  from a greater distance it seemed spherical but as it drew closer it seemed to be an asymmetrical oblong that was spinning.  it moved across the sky from south to north slower than a low flying airplane but much faster than a helicopter.  this settled a dispute that we had about what appeared to be three objects similar to this one escorting a large black airplane that only briefly appeared from the clouds but never exited the cloud line in the direction they were headed.  we wanted to see it better so my partner ran into the sports store and bought a pair of binoculars but while he was inside the object disappeared in the distance.  there was no doubt at this point even to my partner whom is a serious skeptic that what we had seen was not a normal human craft.  what was truly baffling to us is that it was visible in broad daylight, since we assumed that either alien or military experimental crafts would travel under the cover of night.  shortly afterwards a helicopter appeared and circled the area relentlessly for hours as if searching for something.
content.summary: Observed a spinning asymmetrical object with a strange aura and no wings or propellers silently transversing the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Un domingo soleado con cielo despejado estoy con mi novia y 3 amigas comiendo en un parque verde en la zona del arroyo de la dehesa de san sebasti��n de los reyes (madrid)planeando las vacaciones de verano. mientras ellas hablan de sus cotilleos yo estoy tumbado mirando el cielo y comienzo a ver 2 esferas revoloteando encima de mi. en un inicio las veo como luces blancas cuando est��n a 100 o mas metros pero a medida que descienden a unos 50 metros veo que son esferas metalizadas. sus movimientos son fluctuantes y da la impresi��n que est��n rondando la zona. aviso a mi pareja y amigas y ellas miran y me confirman lo que veo pero al instante siguen con su conversaci��n sin mostrar emoci��n ni inter��s alguno. no insisto y contin��o observando con una sensaci��n de paz extra��a pero agradable. al momento aparece otra esfera desde el norte o noroeste y se une a las dem��s en la inspecci��n de la zona o lo que fuere que hiciesen. luego comienzan a marcharse una a una hacia el este direcci��n paracuellos del jarama hasta que desaparecen en el horizonte. al momento aparecen 2 esferas mas y luego 3 esferas. en total 7 esferas. todas marchan la misma direcci��n este. algunas se marchan acelerando de repente y desapareciendo en el horizonte r��pidamente y otras acelerando de manera progresiva.
yo no me sorprend�� porque ya es la 3�� vez que veo esferas en el cielo con las mismas caracter��sticas. una vez en la misma ciudad un a��o atr��s viendo con mi pareja al medio d��a 2 esferas. otra vez en benicarl�� (castell��n) con mi ex novia, una esfera de color irisado metalizado de unos 3 o 4 metros de di��metro a unos 18 metros encima de mi cabeza y est��tica durante unos 15 segundos y en el centro del pueblo y tambi��n al mediod��a, esto ya en el a��o 2004.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,N/A
content.summary: 7 esferas con cambios bruscos de dirección y velocidad a 50 metros de altitud con dirección aeropuerto.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the garden of my house with my husband, when about 01.10 am on the morning of day july 6, 2014, he appeared in the sky groups of four orange balls of light. 
i thought they might be ufos. 
we saw about three groups that ended with one last ball of light in the rear. 
when i saw scared me and i was nervous, but i could get some photos. 
the lights drew a straight path south to north, some of them disappeared or extinguished his light.

you can see in the photos, a white light, this light is a focus from my garden
content.summary: Grouping of orange balls of light

content.detailedDescription:
I attended the 2014 july 4th fireworks extravaganza in poughkeepsie ny with seven close friends. just as the display began i remarked to one of them, "july 4th has historically been a good time to sight ufo's -- late at night, after the displays are over, in the form of dull, luminous orange spheres, alone or in groups. reporting sites were swamped by such reports in previous years. i saw some myself, once." indeed i did on july 5 2010, but that is another story. 

anyway we were seated by the hudson river, just south of the poughkeepsie train station, at the playground with the "whale" or sea-monster sculpture. there were hundreds of people present. a minute or so after the fireworks were completed, i spotted a steady orange light over the highland (ulster county) span of the route 44-55 toll bridge. after a few seconds it began to blink, then after a couple of seconds, it blinked alternately yellow-orange, then green. then the light, which appeared to be just above and slightly north of the westerly suspension column, appeared to move towards us and then to the northeast. 

i pointed it out to my friend and said, "what did i tell you? check this out. definitely not a normal aircraft". my friend remarked that it seemed to dart left and right as it moved forward. we thought the apparent motion was odd and i commented it might have been a drone (though the change in colors of the beacon -- and the change from being non-pulsing orange to pulsing green -- struck me as "non-regulation" lighting"). 

all that was visible was a green globe, which could have been a beacon with a flashing light inside. the size and elevation of the craft was difficult to guage, but the shape of the light/beacon was definitely round or oblong.  no craft outlines were visible nor was there any audible sound. the craft moved quickly over the hudson, towards the northeast, and seemed to accelerate in spurts as it moved away from us. 

at least five of our party witnessed the object, and all agreed the lighting was not typical. my thought at the time was that it might have been a video-equipped drone or quad-copter of some sort, positioned to observe the fire works.
content.summary: Pulsating orange then green light, after 4th july fireworks in poughkeepsie

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of july 4, 2014, my family and i were outside watching fireworks. my husband and i happened to look off toward the east of our house and saw this very odd, glowing red/orange orb in the sky that was moving in a straight line amidst the fireworks. this is probably why we noticed it in the first place, as its movements were inconsistent with typical fireworks. it did not seem to be affected by the fireworks, but just kept moving in a straight line west in the sky. at one point it stopped and started moving back toward the east, where at that point it simply dropped like a rock from the sky. this is the second time i have seen something like this in the sky in this area. the last time was one year ago.
content.summary: Observed a glowing red/orange orb of light moving through sky

content.detailedDescription: It was end of may early june. came home from work at 7pm.  went to the back of my house to get my water hose.  i looked up and saw a shiny chrome oval / tube shape object hovering in the sky towards direction of paper mill crane.  shiny chrome like the silver bullet trailers when sun shines on them or a mirror. it wasn't at the same height as the crane. it was higher up in the sky.  i watched it for about 4 minutes just hovering in a distance.  i then proceeded to the front of the house with my hose as i figured it was probably a plane flying towards me  as i got to the front of the house within a matter of seconds, i told my wife what i saw and to go on the deck and see if she sees something in the sky towards arena and crane.  she said no.  i walked back and it was no where to be seen.  i ran back to front of house, nothing there.  so a matter of seconds, it was gone.  there is no way that this was a plane.  i see planes, jets flying by in a distance and you can keep track of them for great amount of time before they disappear.  this was gone within walking the 30 ft width of my house.  this is the first of a sighting like this for me.  i have seen strange lights in the sky when on the job at night and strange fire like ball, but have never reported these sightings.
content.summary: Came home from work, went to back of house, noticed a oval chrome object hovering over in a distance towards abitibi bowater paper mill crane. walk to front of house, it was gone, went back behind house it was not there.

content.detailedDescription: There was ginger lepricorns in it. they had massive boobs
content.summary: Omg

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On july 1 st around noon, i was swimming in the water on fort lauderdale beach when i observed a flying object coming from the south east. 

in a nutshell, i stood in the water, saw other swimmers did not seem to catch a glimpse of this " thing" while i was able to see it close up , descend ,  check physical presence of apparent beings through sorts of portholes with huge ears , very long noses, and white long teeth stretching out of their mouths in a fashion which reminded me of....Elephants.....!

the object hovered for a few minutes still closing up to about 50 feet or less from my standing point, then suddenly plunged right into the ocean at short distance from boats and swimmers.

funnily, among the " crowd" noone else but me seemed apparently to observe this object and these beings.

another strange fa��t is that the depth where this object plunged seemed very shallow for an object qi believe was about 300 feet large for 30 feet high with portholes about 10 by 4 illuminated from inside and where these strange beings could be seen.

when it dropped into water not a quake came to surface.....
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo flies towards beach then lands in water and disappears

content.detailedDescription:
Le 1 er juillet 2014 vers 3h05 du matin, je rentrais du travail par la route du bord de mer longeant la plage de cagnes sur mer au niveau de l'hippodrome, lorsque je vit une lueur curieuse provenant du sud ouest depuis le cap d'antibes.

j'ai arr��t�� mon v��hicule pour observer cette lueur qui se rapprochait doucement, et prit la forme de trois cercles lumineux dans le ciel �� hauteur du port de cros de cagnes.

les trois cercles volants, illumin��s de l'interieur, volant en formation ecart��s l'un de l'autre de quelques m��tres resterent stationnaires quelques instants avant de plonger ensemble dans la mer sans refaire surface.

ceci m'a ��tonn��.

mon t��moignage doit rester anonyme, ou un contact par mel uniquement car employ�� dans un domaine touchant �� la s��curit��, je ne souhaite pas de contacts t��l��phoniques. merci d'avance de pr��server ma r��putation.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 boules lumineuses qui disparaissent dans l'eau

content.detailedDescription: I was seeing television and my father called me to the balcony. i saw the ufo becoming bright like coming to us and again going back after that disappeared. it was like a star but there was no star before and after the day of the sighting. it was glowing in white colour .Sorry that i could not click a photograph because i did not had any time. so i am giving you an created image.Sorry again!!!
content.summary: It was like a star.

content.detailedDescription:
Imphal, june 19 ��� believe it or not, mystery shrouded ngankha lawai village in manipur���s bishnupur district, 35 kms south of here after a young farmer fainted and was hospitalized following an encounter with an unidentified flying object (ufo).

the mysterious incident occurred when the 31-year-old farmer koiremba kumam was taking video of a fish farm near his house using his mobile phone on june 15 around 3.11 pm.

���suddenly, i captured mashak khangdaba potsak ama (ufo) in the sky,��� the farmer said. ���i fainted for a few seconds after a small round black object sped towards me.���

showing the video image of the ufo captured in his mobile phone, koiremba claimed he felt an electric shock when it came towards him. he returned home after few moments of unconsciousness.

the family took him to the nearby district hospital due to deterioration of his health, and later referred to rims hospital in imphal the following day.

but he was discharged from the hospital the same evening after receiving treatment, as there was no symptom of any illness. however, koiremba said he has not fully recovered.

a similar mystery shrouded leikai village under imphal west district in the early part of last year when the villagers saw a bluish icy mass, weighing around five kilograms which fell on the tin-roofed kitchen of one sougrakpam jugeshwar of the locality with a sudden bang from the sky.

lok sabha mp dr. thokchom meinya, who is also an astronomer, reacting to the descriptions given by the onlookers, had opined that the mass might have been accidentally ejected from the support system of a rocket or a space craft.

this is the startling footage of an unidentified flying object, filmed by a fish farmer in manipur. after filming for 19 seconds, the man experienced loss of consciousness.

according to his family, he was in a semi-unconscious state of over 18 hours after he sighted the ufo in his fish farm, located at ngangkha lawai, moirang near loktak lake.

the doctor's diagnosis read 'loss of consciousness, showing signs of weakness with non-responsive motor response.'

puzzled at his claim of being hit by a ufo shockwave, he was discharged after placing him under few hours of observation.

however kumam koiremba still complains of weakness and exhaustion after his 'encounter' with the ufo
content.summary: Ufo appears in manipur, india! - main faints while taking video

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in yard talking on home phone, phone went dead and i saw object come from nw to se over old growth tree line but below moon in sky. sky clear at this time. object traveled steady from one point to the other, about as fast as a falling star, a bit slower, but maintained its brightness and glow. it was silent as it passed. it occured at 9:52pm, on 7/7/2014, and lasted only about 1-2 minutes tops. from my yard it was traveling directly towards mt. adams. friend called back as i was watching and stayed on phone with me until it was over. went in house at that point and have not gone back outside tonight.

i have lived here for nine years and seen multiple things fly over, but this was unique in that it made no noise and went faster than anything else that flies over here. the lights did not blink or change color at all.

i lost sight of it again as it traveled to the se and sight line disappeared into the old growth trees. i live in the foothills and don't have a large distance of sight.
content.summary: Solid white light w/ glow around it, going nw to se, silent, travel steady and fast

content.detailedDescription: I saw the ufo  in my camera while i am shooting pictures in camera i zoom it but low clarity pictures was taken.I posted that picture in andrew d.Basiago's page or group i don't remember in facebook ,he deleted that photo from his page,he said that he does not want any ufo sighting pictures.I lost that photo
content.summary: I saw the ufo in my camera while i am shooting pictures in camera i zoom it but low clarity pictures was taken.I posted that picture in andrew d.Basiago's page or group i dont remember in facebook ,he deleted that photo from his page,he said that he does

content.detailedDescription: It was the 4th of july 2014, me and about 15 friends were having a cookout and shooting fireworks.  all of a sudden we all saw two red-orange orbs flying overhead in the direction of the greenville downtown airport.  less than two minutes later, two more red-orange orbs flew in the same path of the previous two orbs.  at first we thought it was fireworks, but then the orbs never dissipated.  the orbs continued moving in a straight line for over a few miles until out of sight.  there were no sounds and everybodies reaction was kind of in shock and not sure what those orbs of light could be.
content.summary: Two orange-red orbs

content.detailedDescription: We were at the mustang park on the 4th of july when a glowing orange orb appeared and traveled slowly from the south to the north and then disappeared.  about a minute later, we saw two more orbs, one on top of the other that took the same flight path and disappeared suddenly.  we saw the exact same glowing orange orb at the exact same location and day last year as well.  (only one that time.)
content.summary: Bright orange circular orb traveling slowly from s to n then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from the grocery store on saturday july 5 on 526 north in charleston sc. 

just as i came to my exit which is a downward ramp with a circle turn i glanced up at the horizon and noticed 3 bright lights. i would say they were white with maybe a bit of a yellow hue. 

they were small in the distance which i anticipated was still above the freeway but closer to montage or airport rd near the charleston airport. although near the airport this would not be over the runway but maybe in a landing path. still they were not apparently "heading to the airport" but seemed like they were stationary or moving north if anything. 

also, although small i know from the distance they had to be quite large. in addition they were on a perfect downward slant to the right. if it was on paper you could connect the dots in a straight line (downward angle). 

i thought could they be a plane lights?  however, they were not blinking and way too far away from eachother to be a plane, or even three planes in a line.  planes don't even take off in that distance and i would estimate these were at least 2-300 yards or more away from eachother. they had to be at that distance in my view. 

at this point-ony maybe 5-6 seconds i had to make the exit or run off the road as i began to exit all three lights went out disappeared at the same time. this further made me think i was seeing something unordinary. 

when i got bak on the road at glen mcconnel my view was obstructed by trees and i could not see anything else.
content.summary: Driving home on 526 north noticed three lights on a perfect diagonal separated by 100-300 yards then they all disappeared at once.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog with some buds. and we happened upon a site to see. it was truly a doosy to come up upon.We saw a reptillian life form emerge from a craft with 16 other of his kind. they marched towards us and grabbed my german sheppard husky mix dog and pulled him ahalf . then one shot an incredibly bright neon beam of light at my friend xxxxxxx's chest. he then fell on the ground dead. i ran but dey caught me took me in da spaceship bak to massah. then i woke up in a ditch 35 miles away from my house with mysterious cuts on my lower back and yellowing of the skin. i think i am transforming  into a reptile.
content.summary: Shapeshifting reptillians eject from craft, mutilate animal.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the house with a friend around 9:15 pm facing east. i was approaching my car to open the door and i noticed two white what appeared to be lights that are on when a plane is on approach. what caught my attention was the direction) planes don't use that approach where i live) and a strange hue of orange. it was moving fairly fast heading east to west. i quickly took out my iphone and started recording. the video moves around a little because i could see it much better with my naked eye.
at the very first i thought it was a plane, but then as it got closer it was a dark structure, with white lights in front and a dimly area on the top where it seemed like windows or raised surface. below the white lights was a strange, bright tone of orange and very bright. as it passed there was a clearly visible huge flame on its lower right side. it kept burning the entire time, and kind of reflecting and lighting the side and bottom of the object. it covered several miles very quickly. it neither climbed or descended. never changed speed. we watched it until it went our of sight. never made a sound the entire time, yet it was in the atmosphere, and if i had to guess, maybe a few thousand feet up. i'm understanding that it approached vanderbilt beach and turned north from people who seen at the beach. my feelings all night have been so excited to see such a thing. i was in the air force, and i know aviation well. my instincts were immediately correct when i looked east and thought something odd about this objects approach and color.
content.summary: It either turned on its lights or approached on a turn straight in my direction. huge orange ball below two white blinking lights. it passed with it lower left emitting a big flame. no noise and fairly quick straight line

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1970 i was camping with my family in the national park on the north shore of pei.  i noticed strange bright lights in the sky. it was noon / early afternoon with a clear sky.  this area was a 'normal' dogfight practice area for cfb summerside fighter planes.  at first i didn't realize what i was seeing but the rcmp officer i was chatting with at the time also witnessed this strange phenomenon.  he radioed immediately and reported what we both witnessed.  it was the weirdest sight i'd ever seen.  no noise, no sound of any kind, just two tiny objects way up in the sky, firing at each other.  within 10 minutes both objects just 'broke away' from the fire fight and one disappeared in one direction and the other disappeared into the other direction.  we were standing in the parking lot, near the stairs to the beach.  when i joined my friends on the beach, none of them had noticed it as none of them were looking at the sky at the time. 

a few days later i asked the rcmp officer if he had heard back and he said, "we didn't see it, we didn't see anything".  we just looked at each other and as he was a newly graduated rcmp officer on his first posting, he wasn't going to make waves and no-one would believe a 15 year old girl.   

it was the strangest sight i'd ever seen, and i knew it was not from this planet.  this was during the cold war and i wasn't dumb enough to think the ussr and the usa had such advanced weaponry.  balls of light moving so fast at each other, so rapidly, and then the unbelievable speed at which both ufos disappeared, was just mind boggling to me and to that young rcmp officer.
content.summary: Firefight over stanhope beach between 2 ufos

content.detailedDescription:
The immobile object appeared to be a semi-bright star. i looked away for a couple minutes, then looked back, it was gone. there were no other colors to the object. it looked exactly like a star in the sky where no star should be.

i was out in my back yard smoking.
i noticed the object because it resembled a star in the sky where no star should be.
when i first saw the object, i thought it could have been a distant helicopter, but, there were no running lights visible.
the object did not move while i looked at it.
content.summary: Star light immobile
